td.content: s:female aged 33 yrs presents with mild problem with seeing at night and mild deterioration of eye sight for 6 days. o:Height 150 cm, Weight 79.3 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 15 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.

s:pt describes mild deterioration of eye sight and mild problem with seeing at night. patient is a 33 YO white female ethnologist. Patient does not smoke denies any alcohol use o:Height 150 cm, Weight 78.3 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Glaucoma p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed timolol 0.25% - 1 drp one drop affected eye 2 x day, and ordered Visual Field Testing.
